mapper.insert: insert into weathers_tb(id, dn, dm, dx, sn, sm, sx,ta, ua, pa, time, company_id, device_id, remarks ) values (#{weathers.id},#{weathers.dn},#{weathers.dm},#{weathers.dx},#{weathers.sn}, #{weathers.sm},#{weathers.sx},#{weathers.ta}, #{weathers.ua}, #{weathers.pa}, #{weathers.time},#{weathers.companyId.id},#{weathers.deviceId.deviceId},#{weathers.remarks})
mapper.select: select w.id, w.dm, w.sm, w.ta, w.ua, w.pa, w.time,d.device_name, d.device_state from weathers_tb w INNER JOIN (select max(w.id) as maxid from weathers_tb w group by w.device_id) as d ON w.id = d.maxid INNER JOIN company_tb c ON w.company_id = c.id INNER JOIN device_tb d ON d.device_id = w.device_id ORDER BY w.time desc

select count(w.id) from weathers_tb w INNER JOIN (select max(w.id) as maxid from weathers_tb w group by w.device_id) as d ON w.id = d.maxid INNER JOIN company_tb c ON w.company_id = c.id INNER JOIN device_tb d ON d.device_id = w.device_id ORDER BY w.time desc

select w.id, w.dm, w.sm, w.ta, w.ua, w.pa , w.time, d.device_name from weathers_tb w left join device_tb d on d.device_id = w.device_id left join company_tb c on c.id = w.company_id order by time desc
limit #{pageData.startPage}, #{pageData.limit}

select w.dm, w.sm, w.ta, w.ua, w.pa, w.time,d.device_name from weathers_tb where 1=1
and time like #{time}"%"
